definition: parents of one's daughter-in-law or son-in-law/relatives by marriage
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Many children are now born into or raised in one-parent families.
sentences.chinese: 現在很多孩子在單親家庭中出生或成長。

sentences.english: Fedorova is an only child, and she was brought up by her mother and maternal grandparents.
sentences.chinese: 是單親家庭的女兒，由母親和外祖父祖母撫養長大。

sentences.english: They grew up in one-parent families or with stepmothers and stepfathers.
sentences.chinese: 他們在單親家庭里長大或是繼父繼母帶大的。

sentences.english: Many students came from single-parent families.
sentences.chinese: 許多的學生都來自單親家庭。

sentences.english: His breathing was becoming more intense. He started to argue with groom’s father.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸越來越急促，他同親家公爭辯起來。

sentences.english: The third part is the problem of single-parent students' education in primary school.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分爲小學單親家庭學生的學校教育問題。

sentences.english: He's a social worker responsible for helping children from single-parent families.
sentences.chinese: 他是個社工人員，專門幫助單親家庭的小孩。

sentences.english: Some people nearby began to talk about things such as one-parent family and the like.
sentences.chinese: 附近的一些人開始談論諸如單親家庭這樣的話題。

sentences.english: Due to the increasing divorce rate, there are more and more single parent households.
sentences.chinese: 由於離婚率上升，出現了越來越多的單親家庭。

sentences.english: Their daughter is busy with her job, and their grandson is cared for by their son-in-law’s parents.
sentences.chinese: 老兩口的女兒工作很忙，外孫由親家帶着。

sentences.english: Figures of one-parent families are on the increase in Britain and the US.
sentences.chinese: 單親家庭的數量在英國和美國在增長。

sentences.english: Here are a few hints on how to be a good in-law.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一些提示教你如何做一個好的親家。

sentences.english: Meet the Parents is my favorite comedy.

sentences.chinese: 親家是一種複雜的羣體。

sentences.english: So we became a single parent family and money got really tight.
sentences.chinese: 於是我們家成了一個單親家庭，日子過得捉襟見肘。

sentences.english: Generally specking, single-parent families would change the children's life.
sentences.chinese: 總的說來，單親家庭可能改變孩子的一生。

definition: stuck together as by glue (of lovers)/joined at the hip
to adopt/to give for adoption (usually to a childless relative)
variant of 閒談|闲谈[xian2 tan2]
(metaphorical) punching bag/undeserving target of sb's wrath
to deliver/to send a letter/a letter (of complaint, opinion etc)
